sentences.en: A bigger objection is that aggregation of the results invites distortion.
sentences.cn: 一种更大的异议是把各种结果集中考虑容易导致曲解。

sentences.en: A graphical representation of results is shown in figure 1.
sentences.cn: 结果以图表形式呈现在图1中。

sentences.en: A real pizza oven gives better results than an ordinary home oven.
sentences.cn: 专门的比萨烤箱比普通家用烤箱效果更好。

sentences.en: Compensation is available for people who have developed asthma as a direct result of their work.
sentences.cn: 直接因工作原因患哮喘的人会获得赔偿。

sentences.en: He had the material tested and sent along the results.
sentences.cn: 他对材料做了检验并送出了检验结果。

sentences.en: He has been very vocal in his displeasure over the results.
sentences.cn: 他直言不讳地表达了他对结果的不满。

sentences.en: He suggested a link between class size and test results of seven-year-olds.
sentences.cn: 他认为7岁大的学生的测试分数和班级的规模有关系。

sentences.en: He underwent an agonising 48-hour wait for the results of tests.
sentences.cn: 他苦苦等待了48个小时，化验结果才出来。

sentences.en: His results are likely to reopen the debate on race and education.
sentences.cn: 他的结果可能会重新引起关于种族和教育的辩论。

sentences.en: Many other surveys have produced results essentially in agreement with these figures.
sentences.cn: 许多其他调查已经得出了与这些数据基本一致的结果。

sentences.en: Several conclusions could be drawn from the results described above.
sentences.cn: 从上文描述的结果中可以得出几个结论。

sentences.en: The agreement should have very positive results in the long term.
sentences.cn: 从长远来看，这个协议将会产生非常积极的影响。

sentences.en: The report breaks down the results region by region.
sentences.cn: 报告将调查结果按地区分成若干部分。

sentences.en: The results of the poll dealt a humiliating rebuff to Mr Jones.
sentences.cn: 民意调查的结果对琼斯先生很不利，让他颜面尽失。

sentences.en: The results show the level of frustration among hospital doctors.
sentences.cn: 这些结果显示了医院医生的不满程度。

sentences.en: These studies have already thrown up some interesting results.
sentences.cn: 这些研究已经得出一些有趣的结果了。

phrases.tran_cn: 阳性反应；积极的结果（positive result的复数）

trans.tran_cn: 后果，结果（ result的名词复数 ），成绩（包括比分、得票、获胜者或当选者名单等），成功实现的事
trans.tran_en: A result is something that happens or exists because of something else that has happened

trans.tran_cn: 发生（ result的第三人称单数 ），导致，随着发生，结果发生
